title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/13/18
itunes:title: Ancient Civilizations - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/13/18
description:
George Noory and author Andrew Collins discuss his research into an ancient civilization of giants on Earth called the Denisovans, who had amazing technology and may have been aliens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
